reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Buliza Youth Empowerment Partnership Project

description.narrative: Youth empowerment project is designed to improve the livelihood of 1250 youths by increasing their access to gainful engagement, both formal and informal in 2017-2021. The project is implemented in the Mbogo sector in Norther Rwanda. In partnership with lo cal NGOs and public and private sector, the youth will receive relevant and cost effective training that is aligned with the skills needed in the job market. Emphasis will be on mentorship programmes targeting individuals and youth groups and exposing the youth to avenues for accessing financial services as well as enhancing capacities on business modelling and management services. The youth will also receive training in life skills and sexual and reproductive health. The project targets vulnerable groups l ike the orphans, the disabled, as well as emphasizes the participation of women.
